description: Identifies instances of selective quotation where an author quotes their critic out of context, distorting the original meaning or omitting crucial qualifications.
researcher_question: Where is the critic quoted selectively or out of context?

cherrypicks.quoted_text: string - what author quotes from critic
cherrypicks.quote_source: string - location in response where quote appears
cherrypicks.full_context: string - the full passage with surrounding context
cherrypicks.how_meaning_changes: string - how selective quoting distorts meaning
cherrypicks.author_interpretation: string - what author claims the quote shows
cherrypicks.accurate_interpretation: string - what the quote actually means in context

extraction.core_question: Where is the critic quoted selectively or out of context?
extraction_steps: IDENTIFY QUOTATIONS: Find all quotes of critic in the response
LOCATE FULL CONTEXT: Find the original passage with surrounding context
COMPARE: Assess what is omitted or truncated
ANALYZE DISTORTION: Determine how meaning changes without context
DOCUMENT INTERPRETATION: Note what author claims vs. actual meaning
extraction.special_instructions: Focus on cases where omitted context materially changes the meaning of the quoted passage.

id_examples.to: Cherrypick: Quote omits 'however' clause reversing meaning
